name: Bubble Burst (itch) (Mr.Pamsage)
description:
In this game you need to hit and burst the bubbles falling from the sky. As the score increases the speed of bubbles also increases. If you hit one bubble you will get one point and if you miss one then one point will be deducted. Change your screen size from options given in main menu. Mouse or keyboard control can be chosen from option in game menu.

This is my first game so, please download it comment any bugs or problems you find.

I will be adding more games soon.

Please support me!!
